name: Pop Pop Arena
description:
A competitive game where you play as a party balloon gone bad. Be the last one un-popped! 

A prototype I threw together in the last 6 days of AGBIC Jam 2017.  It is nowhere near being a finished game yet, however, I do plan to continue working on this game even after the jam is over.

Meant to be local multiplayer only, but you can start the game with one player. Gamepads not only supported but encouraged.

Xbox/Playstation/Keyboard|Mouse:

[Left Analog/Left Analog/WASD] Movement
[Right Analog/Right Analog/Mouse]Aim
[A/Cross/Spacebar] - Boost
[Y/Triangle/F] - Pickup/Drop weapon
[R Trigger/R2/Left Mouse Button] Use Weapon

If you run out of ammo, tap the weapon on the floor, wall, or ceiling.
